 avoid out of memory errors since at times I put around 5 heavy sites for s=
pidering. The spidering goes through well but even after the jobs are done,=
 Heritrix consumes a substantial amount of memory with many threads alive.
=

Here is what the memory consumption looks like:

1210132 KiB used; 1277056=
 KiB current heap; 4551168 KiB max heap

ng?
